attributes.action: drop the oath of allegiance to the queen/king
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
living in a democratic country,people who see themselves as " british republicans" are forbidden from becoming members of parliament,joining the armed forces etc unless they swear an oath of allegiance to queen/king and country,when it should only be country.
  britain has to move forward with the times and stop living in it's past.
